channel.title: Need proper godsword stances and specs please
channel.description:
Yes I need these really bad, I'm on a PwnScape 3 source, and can you tell me how to add them, please and thank you :)
-Nate

item.title: Need proper godsword stances and specs please
item.dc:creator: @pkakidjr1 pkakidjr1
item.description:
@pkakidjr1 wrote:

[quote=“laveerre, post:2, topic:280313”]I’m still wondering the same thing cuz i got a pwnscape based (a messed up one) source + client and i understood how to switch so that a item removes the shield when you put it on (like any working 2h) but I didn’t get how to make it so that he has the real stance when holding the “G2H”

Off topic: Yes, now i have the free roam G2H![/quote]lol so u know how to fix?

Read full topic
